channel.title: Work on Simba Tango

item.title: Tempting...
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description:
by  Leo T.

First day at work. First day in my old office for over nine months. On my desk is a roll of paper. I chat with the guy I’m sharing office with, and he tells me that my colleague in the office next door left it for me.  Said colleague must have heard us talking, and enters the office. –The organizer gave it to me, and I brought it back for you.

The roll was a poster for this conference in June. Where? You guessed completely right if you thought the location is… Buenos Aires.

The deadline for abstract submission is February 1st, so there is not much time left. But it is very, very tempting…
